txt.en:
Terror weighs heavily on the Men of Gondor, and some have thrown down their arms in fear. Worse yet, others move to open the Great Gate in desperation and madness.

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>empty</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#00FF00>Merit Gain:</rgb>
* Subjugated soldiers roused
* Terrified soldiers rescued
Defend terrified soldiers from Orcs and rouse subjugated soldiers
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not allow all the hornblowers to alert reinforcements.</rgb>
You should defend the terrified soldiers and rouse subjugated soldiers before they can attempt to open the Great Gate.
